titleStmt.title: A second letter to his honoured friend Mr. M.T. one of the committee chosen by the Common-Council of London for the insuring of houses from fire
titleStmt.author: L. R.

notesStmt.note: Publication date suggested by Wing. Part of a controversy between the City of London and the Insurance Office for Houses; related documents are dated late 1681.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
